releaseNotes:
2.2.2 - changes for hub version 2.2.7.x
2.2.0 - add zigbeeChannel attribute and table entry
2.1.1 - code optimization and clean up merged from nh.schottfam
2.0.1 - use Groovy JsonSluper instead of coded parser
2.0.0 - Allows for user selection of which pieces of pollable information to return
**Please check the Device Preferences after updating to make sure your selections are accurate**
